body:
Hm, looks more like a general format / parsing confusion here... 🤔 

Have you tried
```ruby
format.js { render json: @conference.to_json }
```

Plus: I'm not 100% sure if `remote: true` will automatically make the request a `format: script`one. It could also be a `JSON` request. Have you checked this?
